naslov: Zakup - Kuća za poslovne djelatnosti 221,31 m2 NKP - Maksimir (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Zakup - Kuća za poslovne djelatnosti 221,31 m2 NKP - Maksimir Dajemo u zakup predivnan poslovni prostor u kući ukupne neto korisne površine 221,31 m2 koja se nalazi na parceli površine 454 m2. Idealna lokacija na Bukovačkoj cesti, miran kvart Maksimir, blizina Maksimirske šume, blizina dućana, škola, doma zdravlja i javnog prijevoza. Kuća se prostire na 4 etaže (suteren, prizemlje, prvi kat i potkrovlje). Površina okućnice s garažom iznosi 363 m2. Izgrađena je 1958. godine, kvalitetne gradnje (bez oštećenja u potresu), a kompletno adaptirana 2003. i 2016. godine kada je postavljena nova fasada i stiropor za bolju izolaciju. Zatvorena stambena površina kuće iznosi 169,26 m2. Okolo kuće je popločeno dvorište s garažom 21 m2, ostavom, prekrasnim vrtom i mogućnošću parkiranja više vozila. Ukupno obračunski NKP 221,31 m2. Podrum (23,32 m2) se sastoji od jedne velike prostorije (može biti teretana, ured, spremište,...), kupaonice i stubišta. Prizemlje (47,33 m2) se sastoji od ulazng hodnika, kupaonice, velike sobe (mogućnost pregrađivanja u dvije manje), male sobe i dodatnog izlaza u dvorište. Prvi kat (51,06 m2) se sastoji od dnevnog boravka, kuhinje i blagovaonice, balkona 4,47 m2, hodnika i gostinjskog wc-a. Potkrovlje (47,55 m2) se sastoji od dvije  sobe, garderobe, hodnika i kupaonice. Zbog dobro osmišljenog rasporeda postoji mogućnost pregrađivanja u dvije uredske jedinice s odvojenim ulazima (brojila već odvojena). Kuća je klimatizirana (3 klime), opremljena video nadzorom, alarmom, puno ugradbenih ormara, kompletno namještena cijela kuća i opremljena kuhinja, PVC stolarija, električna ulazna ograda. Orijentacija zapad – istok – jug, visine stropa 2,6 m. Energetski certifikat B, nema tereta. Rent - Business premises House 221.31 sqm - Maksimir We are offering for lease a wonderful commercial space in a house with a total net usable area of 221.31 sqm located on a plot of 454 sqm. An ideal location on Bukovac Street, a peaceful neighborhood of Maksimir, close to Maksimir Forest, shops, schools, health center, and public transportation. The house spans across 4 floors (basement, ground floor, first floor, and attic). The courtyard area with a garage is 363 sqm. It was built in 1958, of high-quality construction (no earthquake damage), and completely renovated in 2003 and 2016 when a new facade and styrofoam insulation were installed. The enclosed residential area of ​​the house is 169.26 sqm. The house is surrounded by a paved courtyard with a garage of 21 sqm, a storage room, a beautiful garden, and parking spaces for several vehicles. Total calculated NKP is 221.31 sqm. The basement (23.32 sqm) consists of one large room (can be a gym, office, storage, etc.), a bathroom, and stairs. The ground floor (47.33 sqm) consists of an entrance hallway, a bathroom, a large room (possible to divide into two smaller ones), a small room, and an additional exit to the courtyard. The first floor (51.06 sqm) consists of a living room, kitchen, dining area, balcony of 4.47 sqm, hallway, and guest toilet. The attic (47.55 sqm) consists of two rooms, a dressing room, hallway, and a bathroom. Due to a well-thought-out layout, there is a possibility of dividing it into two office units with separate entrances (meters already separated). The house is air-conditioned (3 air conditioners), equipped with video surveillance, an alarm system, plenty of built-in closets, fully furnished, including the kitchen, PVC windows, electric entrance gate. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Petrinjska 22, Zagreb Federica Grisogona 8, Zadar
